title: Charming and Attractive Res Lease in New Braunfels. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Check out this fantastic 3-bed, two-story home now available for lease in New Braunfels, TX!
This spectacular open floor plan has high ceilings, tile floors, a ceiling fan over the living room, and large windows that allow in tons of natural light making this home so warm and inviting.
The kitchen comes with elegant black appliances and dark wood cabinetry, perfect for home cooks.
You’ll love the carpeted bedrooms with ceiling fans and the magnificent soaking tub in the master bedroom’s ensuite bath!
The nice weather will be fully enjoyed in the backyard, your pets will love it!
Homes like this go fast so apply now!
All renters are enrolled in the resident benefits package.
Do NOT reply to this ad, please call/text for a fast response.
Listed By: Benjamin Doherty, Sunroom Rentals Texas, LLC
